_sText:
Just a larger version of the map.
Made because it was too small and I was hoping 
the server I play on would pick up map.  The nades
are hyped and do mad damage, so a small map would be campfest
nade fest.  

It takes a long time to compile the first run in a botmatch.
I have included the .nav file in hopes that it helps run on
server, or you don't have to do wait for compile.

I have found putting it to 640x480 and low res on textures 
speeds compiling.  Took me 3 tries before it worked so be
patient.  It crashes right at end,  so CTL ALT DEL and look
to see if it has stopped responding,  it will crash out anyways.
See the splash page image and you're good.

I set the bots to zero, and then walk to middle of map and then use the
sv_cheats_1    and then
nav_generate   to run it instead of letting it run from bot match start.

This is the best version I came up with.  It plays fun.
I love the sprays of dust kicking up all over the place,
it also helps see your aim.

I will try a new map now,  I am done with this.

I have included the editor maps as well so people can
mod this.  I tried to use the shaded lighting,  but I swear
there is not one good lighting primer I could find,  and
the trees were all white when I put one in there,  so do it
yourself if you want fancy lighting. Sorry I am not pro.

Oh put .bsp and .nav into the maps file.  include the other files if you want to edit it.
